# Overview
This EDA summarizes the core datasets currently available in the repository (DESTA, ATOP, IEADB, WTO RTA, UNCTAD IIA). The focus is on coverage from 1990 onward, country participation over time, and regional variation. Regions are based on UN M49 region names (continent-level) mapped via ISO3 codes.

For WTO RTA and UNCTAD IIA, REIOs / non-country entities are excluded from analysis. A record of excluded entities is saved in:

- `outputs/eda/wto_rta_excluded_entities.csv`
- `outputs/eda/unctad_iia_excluded_entities.csv`

All figures and tables below were generated by `scripts/R/eda_run.R`.

# WTO RTA (trade agreements)
The WTO RTA dataset provides agreement-level dates and signatory lists. We report agreements per year and countries per year, using signature and entry-into-force dates (goods/services). Signatories are taken from the current signatories list when available.

# UNCTAD IIA (investment treaties)
UNCTAD IIA provides signature and entry-into-force dates. There is no explicit ratification date, so entry-into-force is used as the closest proxy for a completed ratification/activation step.
